name: dire-hit
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Increases the target’s critical hit chance by one stage until it leaves the field. Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
short_effect: Increases the chance of a critical hit in battle. Raises happiness.

flavor_text.black_white: It raises the critical-hit ratio greatly. It can be used only once and wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: It raises the critical-hit ratio greatly. It can be used only once and wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
